title: SMASH Hackathon
description: Utilized the provided LIGO O3 datasets to train models, focusing on detecting unusual patterns in the strain data without relying on pre-defined templates.

title: Spotify Lyrical Landscapes: Mapping Emotional Themes to Music Popularity (2000-2023)
description: Developed a thematic analysis pipeline to categorize lyrical content based on keyword-based themes and TF-IDF for feature extraction, and presented the findings with visualizations like heatmaps and radar plots to highlight the relationship between lyrical themes and song popularity.

title: Predicting Vermont Business Ratings & Recommending Local Favorites with XGBoost and SVD
description: Built a personalized recommendation system leveraging user-business interactions, location data, and predicted ratings to suggest new businesses based on preferences and proximity.

title: Recipe Calorie Prediction Using Lasso Regression and Feature Engineering
description: Developed and tuned a Lasso Regression model (utilizing Scikit-learn pipelines and transformers) for predicting calories of a recipe utilizing feature engineering, achieving a significant improvement in RMSE from 588.5 (linear regression baseline model) to 37.7.

title: Accenture Federal Services: Harnessing AI for the IRS
description: Enhanced fraud detection for ERC claims, and implemented an AI-chatbot for taxpayer assistance.

title: LLM for Automating i2o Retail Business Reports
description: Built LLM models with Hugging Face, OpenAI API, and LangChain to summarize multi-tabbed business reports, streamlining key insights across sales/marketing metrics for clients and reducing manual analysis time.

title: NourishNet: AI-Powered Personalized Nutrition Recommendations
description: Created a recommendation system that suggests personalized meal plans based on user preferences, dietary restrictions, and nutrient needs, leveraging NLP on recipe datasets.

title: CrimeMap: Hotspot Prediction for Urban Crime Prevention
description: Built a geospatial crime prediction model that identifies high-risk areas using historical crime reports, socio-economic factors, and real-time incident updates.

title: ShopSense: Dynamic Pricing Optimization for E-commerce
description: Designed a machine learning model that dynamically adjusts product prices based on competitor pricing, demand trends, and seasonality.

title: HealthTrack: Predicting Hospital Readmission Rates
description: Developed a classification model to predict the likelihood of patient readmission within 30 days using electronic health records and socio-economic data.

title: GreenRide: EV Charging Station Demand Forecasting
description: Used time-series analysis to predict demand for electric vehicle (EV) charging stations based on weather conditions, traffic density, and location-specific usage data.
